docs.snippet: For all of us, death is the end. For forensic scientists, it's also a beginning....
docs.lead_paragraph: For all of us, death is the end. For forensic scientists, it's also a beginning.

headline.main: Forensics Exhibition Shows How Science Can Make Dead Speak

docs.snippet: The Associated Press has named Claire Galofaro, a veteran newspaper reporter who has covered criminal justice and social service issues, as its administrative correspondent for Kentucky and Tennessee. She will be based in her hometown of Louisvill...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Associated Press has named Claire Galofaro, a veteran newspaper reporter who has covered criminal justice and social service issues, as its administrative correspondent for Kentucky and Tennessee. She will be based in her hometown of Louisville.

headline.main: Veteran Journalist Galofaro Joins AP Louisville Bureau
headline.print_headline: Veteran Journalist Galofaro Joins AP Louisville Bureau

docs.snippet: George Zimmerman will not face civil rights charges in the death of Trayvon Martin, the U.S. Justice Department said on Tuesday, ending its probe three years after the Florida neighborhood watch volunteer fatally shot the unarmed black teenager....
docs.lead_paragraph: George Zimmerman will not face civil rights charges in the death of Trayvon Martin, the U.S. Justice Department said on Tuesday, ending its probe three years after the Florida neighborhood watch volunteer fatally shot the unarmed black teenager.

headline.main: U.S. Won't File Charges Against George Zimmerman in Trayvon Martin Death
headline.print_headline: U.S. Won't File Charges Against George Zimmerman in Trayvon Martin Death

docs.snippet: The growing capability to determine physical characteristics from genetics can help the police, but it also raises questions of rights and profiling....
docs.lead_paragraph: The growing capability to determine physical characteristics from genetics can help the police, but it also raises questions of rights and profiling.
docs.abstract: Scientists are developing tools that allow investigators to create facial image of suspect using DNA found at crime scene; process, known as forensic DNA phenotyping, has raised concerns among some who question technology's accuracy or warn that it could increase racial profiling or lead to privacy violations.

headline.main: Building a Face, and a Case, on DNA
headline.print_headline: Building a Face, and a Case, on DNA

docs.snippet: George Zimmerman, the former neighborhood watch volunteer who fatally shot Trayvon Martin in a 2012 confrontation with the teenager, will not face federal charges, the Justice Department said Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: George Zimmerman, the former neighborhood watch volunteer who fatally shot Trayvon Martin in a 2012 confrontation with the teenager, will not face federal charges, the Justice Department said Tuesday.

headline.main: Justice Dept.: No Federal Charges in Trayvon Martin Death
headline.print_headline: Justice Dept.: No Federal Charges in Trayvon Martin Death

docs.snippet: One program, on History, is a scripted series based on an account of a federal informant, while the other, on WGN, is a reality show....
docs.lead_paragraph: One program, on History, is a scripted series based on an account of a federal informant, while the other, on WGN, is a reality show.
docs.abstract: Neil Genzlinger Critic's Notebook compares several new television shows based on motorcycle gang culture including Gangland Undercover, The Devil's Ride and Outlaw Country.

headline.main: ‘Gangland Undercover’ and ‘Outlaw Country’ Examine Biker Life
